metadata.title: Home
metadata.description: Reserve and book stadiums and sports venues in Tantan, Morocco. Easy online reservations for football fields, basketball courts, and sports facilities in Tan-Tan region.
metadata.keywords: Tantan stadium reservation, Tan-Tan sports venues, stadium reservation Tantan Morocco, reserve football field Tan-Tan, basketball court rental Tantan, sports facilities Tan-Tan, Tantan sports complex, Tan-Tan athletic fields, Tantan playground reservation, Tan-Tan recreation centers

hero.description: Designed specifically for clubs and associations in Tantan city. Access the best stadiums in the region. Simple booking, flexible payments, and quality facilities for your club.

statsSection.title: Numbers that speak for themselves
statsSection.description: Our platform connects clubs with the best sports facilities in the region

featuresSection.title: Everything you need
featuresSection.description: A complete platform to manage your stadium bookings

easyBooking.title: Easy booking
easyBooking.description: Book your field in just a few clicks. Real-time availability and instant confirmation.

flexiblePayments.title: Flexible payments
flexiblePayments.description: Pay per session or via monthly subscription. Automatic invoices and payment tracking.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Stay informed with automatic reminders for your bookings and payments.

security.title: Secure
security.description: Your data is protected. Secure transactions and guaranteed privacy.

availability.title: 24/7 availability
availability.description: Access the platform anytime. Manage your bookings whenever you want.

location.title: Location
location.description: Find stadiums near you with our interactive map and advanced filters.

howItWorks.title: As easy as 1, 2, 3, 4
howItWorks.description: Book your stadium in just a few simple steps

search.title: Search
search.description: Browse our stadium catalog and find the perfect facility for your team.

book.title: Book
book.description: Choose your time slot and complete your booking in just a few clicks.

pay.title: Pay
pay.description: Pay per session or choose a monthly subscription that fits your needs.

play.title: Play
play.description: Arrive at the stadium on time and enjoy your session.

ctaSection.title: Ready to book your next match?
ctaSection.description: Join hundreds of clubs who trust our platform for their stadium bookings.
ctaSection.footerText: Free registration. No credit card required.

metadata.title: Stadiums
metadata.description: Browse and book available stadiums and sports venues in Tantan, Morocco. Find football fields, basketball courts, tennis courts, and other sports facilities for rent in the Tan-Tan region.
metadata.keywords: stadiums Tantan, sports venues Tantan, football fields Tan-Tan, basketball courts rental Tantan, tennis courts Tantan, sports facilities booking Tan-Tan, stadium reservation system, available stadiums Tantan, sports complex booking

hero.description: Discover the best sports facilities in your region. Filter by name or sport to find your ideal location.

noResults.title: No stadium found
noResults.description: Try adjusting your search criteria or removing some filters.

error.message: Failed to load stadiums. Please try again.

card.pricingDescription: Choose between monthly subscription for regular access or pay-per-session for occasional use.

metadata.title: About Us
metadata.description: Learn about our stadium reservation platform in Tantan, Morocco. Our mission is to make sports venue booking easy and accessible for everyone in the Tan-Tan region.
metadata.keywords: about Tantan stadiums, stadium reservation platform, Tan-Tan sports booking service, our mission, about our company, stadium booking system Morocco, Tan-Tan sports community

hero.title: Making Stadium Booking
hero.description: Since 2025, we've been dedicated to transforming how sports clubs and associations reserve stadiums in Tantan. With our platform, booking your perfect venue has never been easier.

mission.title: Our Mission & Values
mission.description: We're driven by a clear purpose: to empower sports communities through technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To make stadium booking simple, transparent, and accessible to every sports club and association in Tantan.

community.title: Community First
community.description: We believe in building a thriving sports community where clubs can focus on what matters most—playing.

trust.title: Trust & Security
trust.description: Your data and payments are protected with enterprise-grade security. We take your trust seriously.

sustainability.title: Sustainable Growth
sustainability.description: We're committed to supporting local sports culture while maintaining fair pricing for all.

features.title: Why Choose Our Platform?
features.description: Designed with clubs in mind, built for efficiency and ease of use.

availability.title: Real-Time Availability
availability.description: See available stadiums instantly and book your preferred time slots without delays.

payments.title: Flexible Payment Plans
payments.description: Choose between pay-per-session or monthly subscriptions based on your club's needs.

access.title: 24/7 Access
access.description: Book and manage your reservations anytime, anywhere through our mobile-friendly platform.

support.title: Expert Support
support.description: Our dedicated team is here to help with booking assistance and technical support.

quality.title: Quality Venues
quality.description: Access the best-maintained and most reliable sports facilities in the Tantan region.

community.title: Community Benefits
community.description: Join a network of clubs, get exclusive updates, and participate in regional sports events.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.description: From vision to reality—how we're transforming sports venue booking in Tantan.

2024.title: Start Building Stadiums
2024.description: Started construction and preparation of sports facilities in the Tantan region.

2025.title: Stadiums Opening
2025.description: Opened stadiums to serve the local sports community with modern facilities.

2026.title: Platform Launch
2026.description: Launched our stadium reservation system to serve the Tantan sports community.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to You
commitment.description: We're committed to continuous improvement and supporting your success.
items: Transparent and fair pricing for all clubs
Regular platform updates and new features

metadata.title: Contact Us
metadata.description: Get in touch with our team for stadium reservations, support, or inquiries about sports venues in Tantan, Morocco. Contact us for booking assistance and partnership opportunities.
metadata.keywords: contact Tantan stadiums, stadium booking support, sports venue inquiries Tan-Tan, customer service stadium reservation, partnership opportunities Tantan, booking assistance Morocco

hero.title: Contact Our
hero.description: Have questions about stadium reservations or partnership opportunities? We're here to help. Reach out to us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

email.title: Email
email.description: Send us an email and we'll respond within 24 hours

form.title: We'd love to hear from you
form.description: Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you shortly.

placeholders.subject: What is this about?
placeholders.message: Tell us more about your inquiry...

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.invalidPhone: Please enter a valid phone number

form.successMessage: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.
form.note: We will respond to your inquiry as soon as possible, typically within 24 hours.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about our platform

responseTime.question: How long does it take to get a response?
responseTime.answer: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24 business hours. For urgent matters, please call us directly.

multipleBookings.question: Can I book multiple stadiums at once?
multipleBookings.answer: Yes! Our platform allows you to manage multiple stadium reservations through a single account. Contact our team for bulk booking information.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods do you accept?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept bank transfers, credit cards, and mobile payment options. Please contact us for specific details about your region.

cancellationPolicy.question: Is there a cancellation policy?
cancellationPolicy.answer: Our cancellation policy varies depending on the stadium and booking type. Please contact us or check our terms for detailed information.

metadata.title: Create Account
metadata.description: Create your account to reserve stadiums and sports venues in Tantan, Morocco.
metadata.keywords: create account, sign up, stadium reservation Tantan, sports venues Morocco, Tan-Tan sports platform

instructions.name_requirement: Full name must be in French
instructions.phone_requirement: Phone number must start with +212 or 06
instructions.email_requirement: Email must be valid and active
instructions.verification_process: You will receive a verification email after registration

metadata.title: Login
metadata.description: Login to your account to manage stadium and sports venue reservations in Tantan, Morocco.
metadata.keywords: login, Login, stadium reservation Tantan, sports venues Morocco, Tan-Tan sports platform

ready.title: Ready to verify your email?
ready.message: Click the button below to verify your email address and complete your registration.
ready.note: Make sure you're on a secure device before proceeding.

loading.title: Verifying Your Email
loading.message: Please wait while we verify your email address...

success.title: Email Verified Successfully!
success.message: Your email has been verified successfully!
success.reviewTimeInfo: Your account is now pending review by our admin team. This usually takes 24-48 hours.
success.callVerificationInfo: An administrator will call you on the phone number you provided to verify your identity.
success.manualVerificationInfo: For security reasons, we manually verify each new account. This helps prevent fraud.

steps.fullAccess: You get full access to your account

success.keepPhoneReady: Please keep your phone nearby. Our team will call from an official number.
success.thankYouMessage: Thank you for your patience during the verification process.
success.weWillContactYou: We'll contact you soon via phone for verification.

error.title: Verification Failed
error.invalidTokenDetails: The verification link appears to be incomplete or malformed.
error.alreadyVerifiedDetails: Your email was already verified. You can proceed to login.
error.expiredTokenDetails: This verification link has expired. Please request a new verification email.
error.genericErrorDetails: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again or contact support.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address to receive a reset link
forgotPassword.instructions: We'll send you an email with a link to reset your password.

success.title: Email Sent!
success.description: Check your inbox for the reset link.

metadata.title: Forgot Password
metadata.description: Reset your password to regain access to your account.
metadata.keywords: forgot password, reset password, recover account

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.instructions: Create a strong new password for your account.

success.title: Password Reset Successfully!
success.description: Your password has been updated. You can now login with your new password.

metadata.title: Reset Password
metadata.description: Reset your password for your account.
metadata.keywords: reset password, new password, change password

success.registered: Registration successful. A verification email has been sent to your email. Please check your email and verify it's you. After verification, the admin will review your account and approve or decline it. If you can't login after verification, please contact the municipal team.
